name: Crazy Parking Of Cars
description:
◆◆◆◆  Crazy Parking 2  ◆◆◆◆
Use the Arrow keys to control the car. Park in the designated parking space to complete the level. Beat all 8 levels! (More coming soon)
◆◆ Mobiles ◆◆
It is kinda possible to play this game on a mobile device. Go to the options and enable touch controls. Then attempt to control the car.
